#include <iostream>
#include <fstream>

int main(int argc, char* argv[]) {
	// Read n and k
	int n, k;
	if (!(std::cin >> n) || !(std::cin >> k)) {
		std::cout << "Not enough numbers.\n";
		return 1;
	}

	// Read sequence
	int sum = 0;
	for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
		int x;
		if (!(std::cin >> x)) {
			std::cout << "Not enough numbers in sequence.\n";
			return 1;
		}

		// Add to sum
		if (i < (n - k)) {
			sum += -x;
		}
		else {
			sum += x;
		}
	}

	std::cout << sum << "\n";

	return 0;
}
